lessons.japanese: だれがこの封筒を破って開けたのか。
lessons.indonesian: Who has torn the envelope open?

lessons.japanese: 封筒には切手を貼りましたか？
lessons.indonesian: Did you put a stamp on the envelope?

lessons.japanese: その朝届けられた郵便を、秘書は開封した。
lessons.indonesian: The secretary opened the mail which had been delivered that morning.

lessons.japanese: その映画は何時封切りになりますか。
lessons.indonesian: When will the film be released?

lessons.japanese: ご要望に従って私の写真を同封します。
lessons.indonesian: In accordance with your request, I enclose a picture of myself.

lessons.japanese: この封筒に住所・氏名を書きなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Write your name and address on this envelope.

lessons.japanese: この紙は大きすぎて封筒に入らない。
lessons.indonesian: The paper is too big for the envelope.

lessons.japanese: この港は封鎖されうる。
いったん封を切るとそのテープは返品できません。
lessons.indonesian: Once you break the seal, you can't return the tape.

lessons.japanese: 履歴書はこの封筒に入れて人事部に提出して下さい。
lessons.indonesian: Enclose your resume in this envelope and submit it to the personnel department.
